design_description.overall_style: Modern, sleek, and fashion-focused **e-commerce mobile application** design. Uses a primarily **monochromatic** color scheme (black, white, and shades of gray) with occasional pops of color for accents (e.g., in ratings and product tags). **Clean typography** and generous use of **high-quality fashion photography** are key elements. The application follows standard **iOS/Android UI conventions** for navigation and controls.

splash_screen_onboarding.purpose: To introduce the brand **'Runova'** and encourage user engagement.
splash_screen_onboarding.layout: Full-screen professional model photograph overlaid with large, bold, stylized **brand text** ('RUNOVA'). A secondary text block below provides a **brand message** ('Elevate Your Style Game With Runova.') and a brief description. A prominent **'Get Started' call-to-action (CTA) button** is located at the bottom.
elements: Primary CTA button ('Get Started') with a chevron/arrow icon

home_screen_discovery.purpose: To allow users to discover and search for products.
home_screen_discovery.layout: Standard top navigation bar, followed by a **personalized welcome** message. A **search bar** is central, along with horizontal **category filters**. The main area displays a **grid-like product feed** with images, basic details, and prices.
elements: Top bar with **User Profile Picture/Avatar** ('Hello! Alexa'), **Brand Name/Tagline** ('Tailored Trends, Handpicked for you.'), and a **Notification Icon** (bell).
Horizontal **Category Selection/Filter pills** (e.g., All, Women, Man, Kid) with one category selected/highlighted ('Women').
Heart/Favorite Icon (top right of the product image).

product_details.purpose: To display all information about a specific product and allow selection and purchase.
product_details.layout: Standard top navigation. Dominant **product image gallery** at the top. Details section below with **product name, rating, size selector, and add-to-cart controls**.
elements: Top bar with a **Back Arrow icon** and **'Product Details'** title. **Heart/Favorite Icon** (top right).
Large, scrollable **Product Image Carousel** with indicator dots.
**Rating and Review Count** (e.g., 4.5/5 based on 256 reviews).
**Size Selector** (horizontal row of pills/buttons: XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL) with 'L' selected.
**Color Swatches/Selectors** (small, colored dots) below the size selector.
Prominent **'Add to Cart' CTA button** with a shopping cart icon.
